Class Card

java.lang.Object
  com.simplify.android.sdk.api.card.BasicCardDetails
      com.simplify.android.sdk.api.card.Card

public class Card
extends BasicCardDetails

Model a credit card, to expose the Simplify.com API.

getBrand

setBrand

public void setBrand(Brand brand)

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Validity check for a card.

Returns:
true if the card number is valid (according to a Luhn check), the CVC is filled in, and the card isnt expired.

validateNumber

public static boolean validateNumber(java.lang.String cardNumber)

Returns true if the card number passes a Luhn formula check.

Note: if the input card number is null, an empty string or composed entirely of whitespace it will be flagged as invalid.

Parameters:
cardNumber - the card number to check.
Returns:
true if the card number passes the Luhn check.

requestToken

public boolean requestToken(TokenAssignmentListener listener)

Invoke the Simplify.com API server to request a CardToken.

The server will be invoked on a background thread, and results returned (on the main application thread) by invoking the passed-in listener.

Parameters:
listener - Listener callback to invoke when a CardToken has been assigned, or an error occured.
Returns:
true if the asynchronous process was successfully started. If the card is invalid the method will return false and not start the asynchronous server API call.
